decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan: within C16/4/CH/501A. Drawings: Design and Access Statement, Flood Risk Assessment, Tree Report, C16/4/CH/501A. Received: 18/08/2016. C16/4/CH/601A. Received: 12/01/2017.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The exterior of the approved building shall be finished in smooth whitewashed render with a yellow stock brick single course brick on edge parapet on the southern elevation above a terracotta tile crease to match the adjacent garage to the east.
description: Listed building consent for erection of a single storey outbuilding to replace existing garage at the rear garden of the house
